game_description: Uptale is the ultimate Immersive Learning platform. Authoring and Publishing solution for trainers, teachers and learners to create and share interactive pedagogical 360Â° experiences in Virtual Reality. Uptale Player is the best way to live Uptale experiences and learn with Oculus. Install, log in and find all your training programs, ready to launch. The application requires the microphone for learning content that allows you to record yourself speaking in specific situations, and you may listen back for assessment. It also allows for different learning paths assisted with voice recognition. There is a visible indicator when the microphone is active.
Supported Controllers: Touch Controllers, Gamepad, Touch (as Gamepad), Hand Tracking
